programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.
The members of the 118 are called to a series of emergencies around Christmas Eve; Eddie struggles with an emotional Christopher.

Athena, Bobby and the 118 must rescue a family whose pick-up truck has been rigged with a pipe bomb that will detonate if the vehicle slows down and goes under 55 mph; Eddie has a rough transition into his new job; Buck makes a relationship decision.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Randy Baker finds his calling as a counselor then winds up dead.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A DNA breakthrough in a murder case that is more than a decade old leads two determined detectives to surprising suspects.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a mother of four dies unexpectedly on Valentine's Day, her death is attributed to natural causes, but a detective suspects that someone murdered the woman.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a mother of four dies unexpectedly on Valentine's Day, her death is attributed to natural causes, but a detective suspects that someone murdered the woman.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: With Voight sidelined, Antonio and Ruzek clash as Intelligence races to solve a high-stakes case involving a series of overdose deaths caused by bad heroin.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence joins forces with Firehouse 51 after a devastating high-rise fire is ruled arson, and Halstead, who has a tragic connection to the fire, struggles to stay objective as he gets deeper into the investigation.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence's investigation into a string of robberies targeting vulnerable immigrants escalates when a teenage girl connected to a critic of the CPD is kidnapped by the robbers.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess finds herself in a difficult situation when she responds to a call while a civilian is in her car for a ride-along that was requested by Brennan.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence's investigation of a nightclub owner suspected of cocaine distribution is complicated when Ruzek recognizes someone close to him while working undercover.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When the wife of an alderman is beaten to death, Voight finds himself under pressure from Brennan to close the case; Upton shares a dark episode from her past to elicit a confession.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight urges Halstead to remain impartial and follow the facts when the leader of a local mosque becomes the suspect in the bombing of an Army recruitment center.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The stakes become personal for Atwater during Intelligence's investigation of a drug dealer suspected of homicide.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As his dependency on prescription painkillers grows, Antonio crosses a line, endangering someone close to him and ultimately putting the entire team at risk.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence investigates a carjacking turned homicide; Ruzek makes a decision that puts his life and career at risk to protect those close to him.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence crosses with a mayoral candidate while investigating the fatal shooting of a well-known defense attorney; Antonio returns to work but questions his own judgment when an operation goes sideways.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight pursues a suspect against the police commissioner's orders; Halstead puts his career at risk when a case involving a recently released drug dealer turns personal.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when Michael takes responsibility for conflict resolution from the Human Relations department.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Employees take some big gambles when they host a charity casino-night in their warehouse.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael unintentionally outs a gay employee; the situation with Jim and Pam.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael organizes a party in his hotel room when he, Dwight and Jan attend the Northeastern Mid-Market Office Supply Convention in Philadelphia.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: After Jan busts Michael for having a "movie Monday," Angela pushes Dwight to make a play for Michael's job.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael tries to help the staff grieve after learning that the former regional manager has died.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight takes Ryan on his first sales call, subjecting him to an outrageous series of tests along the way.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael urges the staff to support Kelly and attend a local celebration of the Hindu Festival of Lights.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Michael strives to keep the staff's spirit up after learning of the Scranton branch shutting down; people envision how their lives will change.

programme.title: The Office

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe an assault and carjacking, only to find that it is connected to illegal trafficking in painkillers apparently headed by an elderly woman (Melinda Dillon).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the disappearance of two high-school students from a museum field-trip; Stabler meets his new partner.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) are unable to build a case against a rape suspect until a new witness (Leslie Caron) steps forward.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an assailant rapes his victim twice, detectives Stabler and Beck (Connie Nielsen) link the case to other victims of multiple rapes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Novak calls upon detective Benson, still under cover in Oregon, to present evidence that will strengthen the case against a brutal rapist.

programme.desc: Harry enlists an unlikely ally to help him save Patience.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular teen is sexually assaulted, Benson and Stabler delve into a modeling underworld of thoughtless parents, drug-dealing doctors and a trendy agency executive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe an assault and carjacking, only to find that it is connected to illegal trafficking in painkillers apparently headed by an elderly woman (Melinda Dillon).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A homeless man is a suspect in the rape and murder of a mother and daughter; it turns out to be Munch's uncle.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A local police captain (Kim Delaney) questions Benson when she investigates a rape outside her jurisdiction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Chris "Ludacris" Bridges) connected to Fin's son goes on trial for the murders of a woman and her baby.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler's job and personal life intertwine when his daughter Kathleen becomes a suspect in a case; after learning that Kathleen may have an emotional disorder, he turns to his estranged mother (Ellen Burstyn) for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the corpse of a famous astronaut is found floating in the waters of Battery Park, Detectives Benson and Stabler think the murder may be connected to a string of serial rapes; at a dead end, Stabler seeks advice from an old mentor (James Brolin).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl at Detective Stabler's daughter's school accuses another student of rape; ADA Paxton (Christine Lahti) returns to prosecute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Olivia's half-brother shows up looking for help when child services threatens to take his kids away; the investigation into an abandoned baby found by a homeless couple leads to a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad tries to keep Detective Rollins' sister safe from her abusive boyfriend when she turns up beaten and pregnant; when Rollins is forced to take drastic action, an internal affairs investigation begins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Carisi's sister's fianc√© falls back into bad habits and accuses his parole officer of rape, Carisi must investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexually assaulted athlete's secret double life could destroy her Olympic career and ruin the case against her attacker; Rollins' sister is released from prison on parole.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a student disappears during a school trip to New York, the cops race to find a mysterious masked man; Fin and Stone both get visits from family.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: We revisit this epic from 2004-05 as ex-Toon boss Kevin Keegan returned to St James' Park as manager of Man City. The hosts featured an evergreen, but still prolific, Alan Shearer.

programme.title: Prem Classics
programme.desc: Arsenal's 49-game unbeaten run had rivals Man United green with envy. Cue an explosive and significant match that ended with a spot of pizza throwing.

programme.desc: An afternoon to remember for all Chelsea supporters as the Blues run riot at Anfield.

programme.desc: TV personality Rylan examines the place of homosexuality within football. He takes a look at his own personal experiences and interviews numerous figures from the beautiful game.
